sentences.en: An old or sick person is often feeble.
sentences.cn: 老人或病人往往很虚弱.

sentences.en: He gave a feeble shrug and tried to squirm free.
sentences.cn: 他无力地耸耸肩，扭动身体想要挣脱。

sentences.en: He told them he was old and feeble and was not able to walk so far.
sentences.cn: 他告诉他们，他年老体弱，不能走那么远。

sentences.en: His voice sounded feeble and far away.
sentences.cn: 他的声音听上去既无力又遥远。

sentences.en: I was surprised by how old and feeble he had become.
sentences.cn: 他变得这样老态龙钟,使我大吃一惊.

sentences.en: In a word, McLennan's defense was miserably feeble.
sentences.cn: 总之, 麦克伦南的辩护是极端软弱无力的.
管理部门软弱无力、胆小怕事.

sentences.en: She made a feeble effort to get to school on time.
sentences.cn: 她努力想按时赶到学校,但未成功.

sentences.en: She replied in but a feeble voice.
sentences.cn: 她仅能以微弱的声音回答.

sentences.en: She was too feeble to feed herself.
sentences.cn: 她虚弱得连饭都不能吃.

sentences.en: She was too feeble to leave her room.
sentences.cn: 她身体虚弱，无法走出自己的房间。

sentences.en: The bishop said it with a feeble voice as he woke.
sentences.cn: 主教醒过来,用虚弱的声音说出.
微弱的掌声叫我们泄气.

sentences.en: The feeble man feels an ache on his heels and knees when he kneels on the steel steering wheel.
sentences.cn: 当虚弱男子跪在钢舵轮上时他的脚跟和双膝感到疼痛。

sentences.en: The Observer found the play "a feeble rehash of familiar Miller themes"
sentences.cn: 《观察家报》认为这部剧“是大家熟悉的米勒式主题的拙劣翻版”。

sentences.en: This is a particularly feeble argument.
sentences.cn: 这个论点尤其站不住脚。

words.tran_cn: 低能的；意志薄弱的；精神薄弱的

trans.tran_cn: 虚弱的，微弱的，软弱的，牵强的
